TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mabuwakay, title = Mabuwakay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mabuwakay} }

S.FORM: Mabuwakay Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Mabuwakay a niyaro', 484 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,344 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 388 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 956 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 26%, Truku 2%, Tayal 1%.

Mabowakay Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Mabowakay a niyaro', 484 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,344 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 388 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 956 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 26%, Troko 2%, Tayal 1%.
